section.title: User's Guide
section.para: This plugin replaces the three Option dialogs in jedit core: Global Options, Plugin Options and Buffer Options. Now you can access all of them from any of them, since they are available as different tabs under the same Dialog.

formalpara.title: Instructions
formalpara.para: Just install it and you'll notice the difference immediately. The "help" action has been remapped via the actions.xml file, to pop up a combined dialog which features all of the options under one roof. I found I was frequently switching between global/plugin options, so I wanted to make that easier. Adding buffer options seemed like the next logical step.
